title: I left r*ddit because it was cucked and filled with SJWs, idiotic memes and faggotry. So what do I see here on the front page? Faggotry about broccoli

body: Its a young website faggot, get a grip, let it some time to mature
body_html: Its a young website faggot, get a grip, let it some time to mature

post.title: I left r*ddit because it was cucked and filled with SJWs, idiotic memes and faggotry. So what do I see here on the front page? Faggotry about broccoli

author.bio: You've come here to dig up dirt, probably because you lost an argument and are now resorting to petty tactics. My opinions may offend, in a free society that's acceptable. Much love and peace.
author.bio_html: You've come here to dig up dirt, probably because you lost an argument and are now resorting to petty tactics. My opinions may offend, in a free society that's acceptable. Much love and peace.

body:
Better than the political spam or the random offensive posts we've seen so far (I guess some people still need to get it out of their system).

It's a free platform. Contribute in upvoting/dowvoting as you see fit, but complaining about it contributes nothing.
body_html:
Better than the political spam or the random offensive posts we've seen so far (I guess some people still need to get it out of their system).

It's a free platform. Contribute in upvoting/dowvoting as you see fit, but complaining about it contributes nothing.

author.bio: You've come here to dig up dirt, probably because you lost an argument and are now resorting to petty tactics. My opinions may offend, in a free society that's acceptable. Much love and peace.
author.bio_html: You've come here to dig up dirt, probably because you lost an argument and are now resorting to petty tactics. My opinions may offend, in a free society that's acceptable. Much love and peace.

body:
I'd like to see a platform dedicated to science, history, philosophy, and constructive discussion but it's inevitable we'll get those flooding ruqqus with 'blame the j00s' and 'l0lcats'.

My point is that even with your point being valid, those kinds of users aren't going to bother changing their behavior. They might even double-down just to spite you.

Contribute what you can and upvote/downvote to your preference. I think that's the only way you're going to see the desired results and that's what I was trying to say earlier.
body_html:
I'd like to see a platform dedicated to science, history, philosophy, and constructive discussion but it's inevitable we'll get those flooding ruqqus with 'blame the j00s' and 'l0lcats'.

My point is that even with your point being valid, those kinds of users aren't going to bother changing their behavior. They might even double-down just to spite you.

Contribute what you can and upvote/downvote to your preference. I think that's the only way you're going to see the desired results and that's what I was trying to say earlier.

body: I don't know, maybe some specific people shouldn't have have begun with the "Broccoli is jewish control measure" bullshit in the first place. Who were these people again?
body_html: I don't know, maybe some specific people shouldn't have have begun with the "Broccoli is jewish control measure" bullshit in the first place. Who were these people again?

post.title: I left r*ddit because it was cucked and filled with SJWs, idiotic memes and faggotry. So what do I see here on the front page? Faggotry about broccoli

body:
The entire Broccoli is/was funny as shit. Don't like the humor, don't look at it. No one is holding a knife to your throat making you participate. 

Don't tell other people what kind of taste to have, or what they should find funny. The most faggot crap on earth is someone insulting other people's personal taste in an effort to shame them or take away other people's fun and make them as miserable as the faggot insulting them
body_html:
The entire Broccoli is/was funny as shit. Don't like the humor, don't look at it. No one is holding a knife to your throat making you participate.

Don't tell other people what kind of taste to have, or what they should find funny. The most faggot crap on earth is someone insulting other people's personal taste in an effort to shame them or take away other people's fun and make them as miserable as the faggot insulting them
